channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- ABB ARG600 Wireless Gateway series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- ABB ARG600 Wireless Gateway series

item.title: CVE-2022-0947|2024-09-17T01:01:17.567Z -- abb -- abb%20arg600%20wireless%20gateway%20series
item.description: A vulnerability in ABB ARG600 Wireless Gateway series that could allow an attacker to exploit the vulnerability by remotely connecting to the serial port gateway, and/or protocol converter, depending on the configuration.
